channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server 2008 Cumulative Update 1 is available from Microsoft
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Bruce Patin
item.dc:creator: Bruce Patin
item.description: Problem was fixed by uninstalling then re-installing SQL Server 2008 Reporting Services from scratch, being careful not to change any usernames in the process.
item.content:encoded: Problem was fixed by uninstalling then re-installing SQL Server 2008 Reporting Services from scratch, being careful not to change any usernames in the process.

item.title: By: Bruce Patin
item.dc:creator: Bruce Patin
item.description: I applied this "fix", but it still did not fix the Reporting Services 2008 problem when trying render the report: "An error occurred during client rendering. Object reference not set to an instance of an object."<br />
item.content:encoded: I applied this “fix”, but it still did not fix the Reporting Services 2008 problem when trying render the report: “An error occurred during client rendering. Object reference not set to an instance of an object.”
